javadoc:
Wrapper class to hold field factory information in the text field to be provided to the
 highlightProvider to get highlights just before the field is painted.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: provider
params.comment: the HighlightProvider that will actually compute the highlights.

params.name: fieldFactoryClass
params.comment: the class of the field factory that generated the field to be rendered.

params.name: obj
params.comment: the object that holds the information that will be rendered (usually a code unit)

methods.name: getHighlights
methods.comment: Returns the highlights for the given text.

params.name: text
params.comment: the text to be considered for highlighting.

return.comment: an array of highlights to be rendered.

name: FieldHighlightFactory
comment:
Wrapper class to hold field factory information in the text field to be provided to the
 highlightProvider to get highlights just before the field is painted.
